name: Mirror Paper
description:
Avoid the obstacles moving two balls symmetrically. The balls will tend to keep their position close to the border, when you tap, the balls will move to the screen's center.

Add points avoiding the obstacles and share your score with your friends.

Download Mirror Paper from Google Play using this link Mirror Paper, or you can purchase PRO version here.

Find more by Tangled Games here: http://www.tangledgames.net
